title: Pallone Opening Remarks at Legislative Hearing with FTC Commissioners
summary: Chairman Pallone's opening remarks at a legislative hearing with the five Commissioners of the Federal Trade Commission.

title: 139 Lawmakers Urge EPA to Reinstate Waiver for California’s Clean Car Standards
summary: 139 lawmakers wrote to EPA Administrator Michael Regan today, urging him to reinstate California's Clean Air Act waiver.

title: E&C Announces Health Hearing on Neurodegenerative Diseases
summary: Pallone and Eshoo announced a Health Subcommittee hearing on neurodegenerative diseases.

title: Energy and Commerce Leaders ask FDA about COVID-19’s Impact on FDA’s Foreign Drug Inspection Program
summary: Bipartisan E&C leaders wrote to FDA regarding the agency's foreign drug inspection program.
